exercise.title: Return Value

p.i: A function can also return a value. For example, you can assign the return value to a variable.

exercise.p: The function Math.random() returns a value from the range [0, 1[. Call the function and assign the return value to the variable randomizedNumber. After that, write the value of the variable into the browser console.
Submit a link to your code (myy or jsbin).
